data.title: Nur Islamic International School (Fees & Reviews) Bandar Seri Begawan, Brunei, Jalan Muara, Kg Manggis, Simpang 291
data.meta_description: Why Miftah an-Nur Islamic International School? 25,000+ Parent Reviews, Tuition Fees, Ratings, Curriculum | Jalan Muara, Kg Manggis, Simpang 291 | At Miftah An-Nur we are dedicated to nurturing and developing intelligent, creative and God-conscious young people through a broad, balanced and
data.text:
At Miftah An-Nur we are dedicated to nurturing and developing intelligent, creative and God-conscious young people through a broad, balanced and personalised education experience that anchors and inspires our pupils spiritually and academically for the rest of their lives.

Blending the best of the British National Curriculum with our Bruneian heritage and Islamic values, our specially modified curriculum encourages pupils to build on their existing knowledge and skills, ensuring a continuous and expansive learning journey that develops the child as a whole.

We strive to adapt the curriculum wherever possible to meet the needs and strengths of our pupils, as well as providing opportunities for students to pursue their own interests and develop their particular talents in ways that work best for them.

As a multilingual school, we also offer pupils the chance to learn in English, Malay and Arabic, adding to the strong foundations we aim to provide each and every one of them as we endeavour to cultivate accomplished, principled and thriving global citizens.

Currently, the school has Early Years and Primary School available. In 2023, Miftah An-Nur will open their secondary school.
